entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
